9.title: Setup
9.subtitle: M4 MacBook Air, Keychron Q1
9.description:
I care very much about my desk setup and tech. My main machine is an M4 MacBook Air (16GB RAM, 512GB SSD)

I am also a mechanical keyboard enthusiast. My current build is a Keychron Q1 V2 (Knob) with Gateron Milky Yellows (lubed w/ Krytox 205g0) and Keychron Binary Cherry Dye-Sub PBT keycaps. I use stock stabilizers (factory pre-lubed) and I use a foam + PE foam mod using the Keychron Q1 Acoustic upgrade kit.

Other parts of my setup include my monitor - Acer EK241Y Gbi (24", 1080p, 120Hz), my headphones - AKG K240 Studio (55Î©), my mouse - Razer Basilisk V3, and my microphone - Blue Snowball iCE.

10.title: Games
10.subtitle: A Variety of Games
10.description:
I occasionally play games. The game I have the most playtime on is Geometry Dash, with over 1000 hours on Steam, and 63 Demons completed. My hardest is Future Funk (Hard Demon) and I had a 72% PB on Acu (Extreme Demon). I also play Rocket League (Diamond I ğŸ’)

I also consider myself decent at Tetris, and quite good at Minesweeper and Geotastic.
